    public class TestView
extends com.vaadin.ui.VerticalLayout
implements IContentComponent

    View implementing the test feature - purely for development.

    This class contains some useful code snippets should they ever be needed. This is also the perfect place to try various things being integrated into production code.

    Author:
    SkyCrawl
